title: Why is Vayne such a cancerous champ to deal with?
body:
Dear Rito

Please explain why you have not done anything to nerf the shit outta vayne when with guinsoo's and bork she can fuck anything up

how the hell can she just effortlessly cleave throguh champs in fucking 3 seconds after taking a gangbang from 3 people, one of which was a full vel ult to the fuckign face thats 1.3k true damage right there plus damage from spells and she got away with 3/4 hp


like FUCKING FIX THIS PIECE OF SHIT PLEASE I FUCKING BROKE MY HEADSET CAUSE OF THIS SHIUTLORD

Edit: Yes I was mad. I just don't understand how riot can keep such a champ like vayne the way  she is. I'm aware that if she gets fed early its gg, since if she just makes it mid game without dying its gg. If she gets killed early then its gg for her. I get snowbally champs, but that is just ridiculous how much damage she can do when a little ahead, then it gets to a lot ahead then before you know it she has 20k gold when the fed vel on the other team has 13k and died 4 times in the last 10 minutes just because you can tumble auto auto him and he dies

replies.body:
47.8% win rate, and 48% plat and above, yep totally a broken champ there.

The reason it's not being nerfed?

Because it's a damn shitty build that only works in low elo at best, and at worst just doesn't work at all.

Guinsoo's is bad, because not only do you lose AS from building the item (until you have at least 4 stacks) but you have just spent 3.6k gold on 35 AD and a mediocre passive.

Sure it's great if the enemy fights you just after you finish minions off, but assuming the enemy team doesn't let that happen, you have a huge waste of gold until 6 auto's into the fight, that is no small amount of time.

Gold Value's (taken from the wiki);

35 attack damage = 1225 Gold
50 ability power = 1087.5 Gold
15 on-hit magic damage = 375 Gold
Gold Value = 2687.5 Gold

6 stacks
48% attack speed = 1200 Gold
18 attack damage = 630 Gold
24 ability power = 522 Gold
Gold Value = 2352 Gold
Total Gold Value = 5039.5 Gold

But wait, vayne doesn't use AP so lets go fix all these numbers to not take AP into account.

35 attack damage = 1225 Gold
15 on-hit magic damage = 375 Gold
Gold Value = 1600 Gold

6 stacks
48% attack speed = 1200 Gold
18 attack damage = 630 Gold
Gold Value = 1830 Gold
Total Gold Value = 3430 Gold

Now let's take into account that you just paid 3600 Gold for this, and considering the main benefit isn't in effect until 2-4 seconds into a fight (unless again the enemy team engages just after a minion wave.) this is a terribly worthless item, and you gain more by buying something like PD which gives you useful stats, and doesn't require the fight to finish before you are useful.

The biggest complainers are the people who try to fight a vayne after she clears a minion wave, and they get one shot because they did something that was stupid.
You can't put a gold value on the passive effect. Go back and recalculate what silver bolt procs every second attack will do to its value.

Again, the assumption here being you have the passive up, if your alive for long enough in a fight to get off 6 auto attacks, the enemy team is shit and could probably be killed by the more effective vayne items.
Why would you go into a fight with no stacks?
Why would anyone fight vayne with stacks?

Read the OP's comments for the answer to that. Don't have much choice but to fight when you cop a malph ult to the face, for example. Or when a stacked vayne ults+tumbles+botrks you. You ain't running away from that

lol its easy to be alive long enough to get guinsoo's procs when you life steal your max health after every hit. It was so bogus like even just thinking about it now makes me angry. I wasn't even mad at the game, and thought every played well, except the vayne because it was bs. Literally, every time she would come up the fun of the game just left because you are left with an unkitable invisible enemy that just two shots you with autos. Can't burst her down because of lifesteal. Can't fight her because she fights better. Literally, a full q w e w ult from me was somewhere between 2-2.5k damage with 1.3 being true damage because of the researched target. And she survived with over 1/2 her hp cause the xin in her face she just lifestealed her health back from.

guinsoo only good on kog now
vayne is not broken lol learn to lock her down its actually not hard

She is strong, and a great duelist overall, her damage output is decent, but lay any kind of CC, burst, lockdown, snares and she will die in a team fight. Her short range and lack of flat dps as well as situational hard CC compared to other ADC's are her shortcoming. 

To put it simply, most adc's do more damage than vayne, amazing isn't it? Some adc's are more mobile and have more range so overall they are much safer. They also have stronger CC, Poking abilities, tankier and more burst. All of these traits inherently make them better team fighters because they are easier to peel for and have tools at their disposal for their own safety. 

Guinsoos is actually bad on Vayne despite popular belief. While the on hit passive is decent it you can only really take advantage of phantom hit at 6 stacks of guinsoos and to be actually honest, you are far better off with a crit build simply because you would deal more physical damage than true damage every time.

She's always been broken, but Riot refuse to nerf her.
Hell they buffed the thing about her that makes her overpowered.

Silver Bolts used to do 8% Max HP, now it does 12%.

People complain about the Tank Meta, yet the existence of Vayne makes the Tank Meta look like Wet Paper Bag Meta.

No champion should have True Damage as a MAX % HP attack. It's absolutely ridiculous.
"OH BUT VAYNE IS SUPPOSED TO KILL TANKS" cry the mongs that worship Doublelift.
Yeah she can still do that if the MAX HP is changed to CURRENT HP and the % number reduced back to 8%.
I agree that true maxhp% damage is broken. Buff it to 15% but make it physical or magical damage imo so resistances can take effect, or nerf it to 6% max hp because thats still shredding tanks

its just so broken you hit her with something and shed just heal it with lifesteal

maybe riot should remove lifesteal from items, i like the mechanic but its just too broken on dueling champs imo you shouldn't gain that much life through dealing so much damage ever
That applies to literally anyone with lifesteal. If you let them get away at low health and not expect them to come back in soon with full, thats your fault
lol she wouldnt need to walk away with low health, sh'ed get it all back in combat which is broken. literally 3v1 us and her lifesteal kept her above 3/4hp, which imo is bs
